title: highchair
description: somewhere there is a baby/small child in a highchair/booster seat

title: dropped silerware
description: someone drops silverware (not on purpose)

title: rolling/ polishing
description: there is a server rolling silverware into napkins

title: B-Day song
description: waiters sing 'happy birthday' to a customer

title: Wet Area sign
description: there is a 'Caution: wet floor' sign somewhere

title: Walkers/ cane
description: there is a customer that uses a walker or cane

title: asked ? When chewing
description: the waiter asks you a question while you're in the middle of chewing food

title: Meet the Parents
description: there is a couple in the restaurant that is meeting their significant other's parents

title: worker on cell
description: someone who works at the restaurant is on their cell phone

title: Parties
description: there is a large party (6 or more people in one group)

title: Tables rearranged
description: someone rearranges tables to better accomodate

title: server flagged down
description: someone gets a waiter's attention for something

title: snap fingers
description: someone snaps their fingers to get their waiters attention

title: bumps into something
description: someone bumps into something

title: Hear dishes fall
description: someone somewhere dropped some dishes (not just silverware)

title: Sitting on same side of table
description: people (probably a couple) sitting on same side of table/booth with no one on the other side

title: "and water"
description: someone orders a soda or other drink, as well as a water

title: "no ice"
description: someone asks for a drink without ice

title: knock over something
description: someone accidentally knocks something over

title: manager yelling
description: restaurant manager is yelling at someone

title: manager makes table rounds
description: manager comes around to ask how everything is

title: change table
description: someone changes to a different table than they were originally seated

title: wobbly table
description: your table is wobbly

title: change radio/ tv/temp
description: someone changes the radio station/tv channel/room temperature

title: Christmas before thanks- giving
description: the restaurant is playing christmas/holiday music before thanksgiving

title: crying baby
description: there is a baby/small child that is crying

title: rowdy kids
description: there are children being obnoxious/loud/disruptive

title: two-face server
description: server presents themselves as nice and happy when talking to you, but when they turn around and walk away they are not

title: drops change
description: someone (worker or customer) drops the change from a bill

title: sends food back
description: a customer sends their food back to be remade

title: "where's the bathroom"
description: someone asks where the bathroom is

title: table runs the server
description: a table keeps asking for things causing the server to constantly go back and forth

title: find something in food
description: something inedible/not food (like hair or a fingernail or something) is in your food

title: playing games at table
description: customers playing a game at the table (not including you playing diner bingo)

title: "check please"
description: someone asks for the check

title: asks for manager
description: a customer asks to speak to the manager

title: awkward date
description: there is an awkward date occurring in the restaurant (hopefully not to you)

title: date stood up
description: some poor fool got stood up for a date

title: under- staffed
description: service is slow because of understaffedness/server apologizes due to understaffedness

title: missing stuff in the bathroom
description: things missing in bathroom (TP, soap, etc)

title: out of something
description: restaurant is out of something you/someone wanted

title: order stuff off-menu
description: someone orders something that isn't on the menu

title: wrong drink
description: someone gets a drink they didn't ask for

title: arnold palmer
description: someone orders an arnold palmer

title: get a number
description: you have to get someone's phone number (not someone at your table

title: overly happy server
description: your server is waaayyyyyy too happy

title: wrong food
description: you get brought the wrong food

title: walks by with food not yours
description: a server walks by your table with food that isn't yours

title: coke or pepsi products
description: you ask for a coke product but they only have pepsi products, or vice versa

title: "crispy"
description: someone asks for something to be made crispy (like bacon or toast)

title: "your food will be out soon"
description: your server tells you your food will arrive soon

title: "where's an outlet"
description: someone asks where an outlet is

title: kid's menu
description: someone has a kid's menu

title: "table or booth"
description: host asks if you want a table or booth
